pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao

Interface MessageDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageDAOImpl

    public interface MessageDAO
    Interface for performing database operations on Message objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary
